alert.note: Alert for Henry; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 9:43AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Weakley and Henry Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 943 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Palmersville, or 14 miles northeast of Martin, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Paris, Dresden, Gleason, Cottage Grove, Latham, Routon, Palmersville, Puryear, Henry, Jones Mill, Como, Brundige, Sunnyside, Pisgah, Whitlock, Porter Court, Conyersville, Matheny Grove, Ore Springs and Hyndsver. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
